post:
XVM Labs just got two new, totally awesome plans:


    512 MB DDR3 ECC RAM
    50 GB SSD RAID-10
    100 GB Bandwidth on GigE
    Platform: OpenVZ + KiwiVM
    DC: QuadraNet (Los Angeles)
    1 IPv4 (max. 7 IPv4)
    $14.71 per year    
 

    1024 MB DDR3 ECC RAM
    100 GB SSD RAID-10
    300 GB Bandwidth on GigE
    Platform: OpenVZ + KiwiVM
    DC: QuadraNet (Los Angeles)
    1 IPv4 (max. 7 IPv4)
    $26.71 per year
    
Older plans are still available:

    512 MB RAM/5 GB SSD/100 GB transfer: $4.71/year 
    1024 MB RAM/15 GB SSD/300 GB transfer: $9.71/year
    
Order at https://xvmlabs.com/
